title: What is the point of Twisted Treeline if we will just keep allowing automated cheaters? Please RIOT
body:
Every game I have played this week in treeline has involved cheaters using automation software to farm for them. 

Why are we pretending this isn't happening? I really like that map, but it is completely destroyed because automated scripting is allowed. Some measures need to be taken. It is not fair that I get penalized for exited a game full of automated scripters while they are allowed to farm accounts. I literally have to report every single game, and I see no benefit to it. I don't see any change.

Please fix this problem. Even if I have to do some sort of human validation before the game, it would be better than wasting hours playing against robots.

Please.

replies.body: Hope you are reporting them. It helps Riot Validate their Bot checks.
Dominion players struggled against the bot epidemic for years too. Then Riot shut down Dominion and cited the number of bots as one of the reasons.
